terms.readCarefully: Please read the following business information and terms of service carefully:
terms.peakHoursNote: 8:00-12:00 is peak hours, walk-in customers may not be accommodated
terms.earlyPickupNote: After 14:00 is early pickup time for the day before
terms.shuttleCondition1: Free shuttle when daily rental reaches ¥10,000/person
terms.shuttleCondition2: For lessons, please arrive at least 60 minutes early
terms.section1Item1: We provide online reservation for ski equipment rental services
terms.section1Item2: Service area: Furano City, Asahikawa City
terms.section2Desc: We reserve the right to restrict or cancel rental eligibility in the following cases:
terms.section2Item3: Record of overdue or unpaid rental fees
terms.section2Item4: Unable to reach registered contact information
terms.reservationItem1: Complete online registration, payment, and receive confirmation email
terms.reservationItem2: To modify reservation, please contact Line customer service
terms.confirmItem1: Confirmation email sent within 24 hours after reservation
terms.confirmItem2: Please bring on pickup day: Passport, confirmation email, payment proof
terms.refundPolicy: Refund & Rescheduling Policy (Based on Pickup Date):
terms.refund14Days: Cancel 14+ days before pickup (excluding pickup day)
terms.refund14DaysResult: Full refund minus 4% card processing fee
terms.refund3Days: Cancel 3 days or less before pickup
terms.changeDateNote: Must be done at least 3 days before pickup (excluding pickup day), only one change allowed
terms.changeDaysOrCancel: Change rental days or partial cancellation
terms.changeDaysOrCancelNote: Treated as full order cancellation, requires new reservation
terms.calculationNote: Pickup day is Day 0, one day before is Day 1, and so on
terms.sizeItem1: Actual size based on on-site fitting
terms.sizeItem2: If size doesn't fit, we'll provide the closest available stock
terms.returnItem1: Must return on the last day of rental period
terms.returnItem2: Late fee: one day's rental per day overdue
terms.returnItem3: Items not returned within 7 days are considered lost
terms.damageItem1: Lost or severely damaged: 20x daily rental fee
terms.damageItem2: Compensation covers rental item loss and business loss
terms.safetyItem1: All equipment is cleaned and sanitized before and after rental
terms.safetyItem2: Safety check briefing before equipment rental
terms.safetyItem3: If you find equipment issues, stop using immediately and contact us
terms.hygieneItem1: Please raise any hygiene concerns at rental time
terms.hygieneItem2: We recommend renters purchase their own ski insurance
terms.shuttleItem1: Actual service subject to on-site conditions
terms.shuttleItem2: We are not liable for any losses due to shuttle delays (including missed transportation)
terms.luggageItem3: Must be retrieved before closing time
terms.weatherItem1: Shuttle service may be suspended during blizzards
terms.weatherItem2: Free rental extension during natural disaster closures
terms.equipmentItem1: If equipment malfunctions during rental, contact us immediately
terms.equipmentItem2: We will provide free replacement equipment or repair assistance
terms.equipmentItem3: We are not liable for lost skiing time due to equipment malfunction
terms.disclaimerItem3: Losses due to natural disasters or force majeure
terms.disclaimerItem4: Equipment damage due to improper use or technique
terms.privacyItem1: Used only for rental contract purposes
terms.privacyItem2: Not disclosed to third parties in principle
terms.privacyItem3: Contact us to modify your information
terms.legalItem1: This contract is governed by Japanese law
terms.legalItem2: Disputes shall be under the jurisdiction of Furano Summary Court
terms.importantItem1: All services are subject to actual on-site conditions
terms.importantItem2: Matters not covered will be handled according to our regulations
terms.importantItem3: Please read the above regulations before making a reservation
terms.thankYou: Thank you for choosing Snow Force. Have a great time skiing!
terms.contactLine: For any questions, please contact Line customer service
